languages.text: {n}Абеляр перехватывает оружие поудобнее, оглядывая чудовищное создание.{/n} "Откуда у меня ощущение, что я... нет, не видел... но встречал это порождение варпа?" {n}Старый офицер хмурится, словно пытаясь извлечь из недр памяти упрямое воспоминание.{/n}

{n}Abelard adjusts his grip on his weapon as he surveys the monstrous creature.{/n} "Why do I get the feeling that I have seen, no, not seen but come across this warp spawn before?" {n}The old officer frowns, as if trying to pry a stubborn memory out of the depths of remembrance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр перехватывает оружие поудобнее, оглядывая чудовищное создание.{/n} "Откуда у меня ощущение, что я... нет, не видел... но встречал это порождение варпа?" {n}Старый офицер хмурится, словно пытаясь извлечь из недр памяти упрямое воспоминание.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard adjusts his grip on his weapon for more comfort as he surveys the monstrous creature.{/n} "Why do I get the feeling that I have — not seen, no, but — come across this warp spawn before?" {n}The old officer frowns, as if trying to pry a stubborn memory out of the depths of remembrance.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德握紧了武器，仔细打量着眼前的怪物。{/n}“为什么我总觉得以前见过这个亚空间的怪物？不，不是见过，而是亲身遇到过。”{n}这位年迈的军官皱起眉头，似乎打算从意识深处撬出某段顽固的记忆。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard adjusts his grip on his weapon as he surveys the monstrous creature.{/n} "Why do I get the feeling that I have seen, no, not seen but come across this warp spawn before?" {n}The old officer frowns, as if trying to pry a stubborn memory out of the depths of remembrance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德握紧了武器，进一步打量着眼前的怪物。{/n}“为什么我总觉得以前见过这个亚空间的怪物？不，不是见过，而是亲身遇到过。”{n}这位年迈的军官皱起眉头，似乎打算从意识深处撬出某段顽固的记忆。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard verlagert die Hand an seiner Waffe leicht, während er die monströse Kreatur mustert.{/n} "Warum habe ich das Gefühl, dass ich dieses Warpgezücht schon einmal gesehen habe? Nein, nicht gesehen, aber ich bin ihm schon einmal begegnet." {n}Der alte Offizier runzelt die Stirn, als würde er versuchen, eine sture Erinnerung aus den Tiefen seines Gedächtnisses zu kramen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard adjusts his grip on his weapon as he surveys the monstrous creature.{/n} "Why do I get the feeling that I have seen, no, not seen but come across this warp spawn before?" {n}The old officer frowns, as if trying to pry a stubborn memory out of the depths of remembrance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard verlagert die Hand an seiner Waffe leicht, während er die monströse Kreatur mustert.{/n} "Warum habe ich das Gefühl, dass ich dieses Warpgezücht schon einmal gesehen habe? Nein, nicht gesehen, aber ich bin ihm schon einmal begegnet. {n}Der alte Offizier runzelt die Stirn, als würde er versuchen, eine sture Erinnerung aus den Tiefen seines Gedächtnisses zu kramen.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard agarra con más firmeza su arma mientras examina a la monstruosa criatura.{/n} «¿Por qué tengo la sensación de que ya he visto...? No, verlo no, pero sí que me he topado antes con este engendro de la disformidad». {n}El viejo oficial frunce el ceño, como si intentase arrancar un recuerdo reticente de lo más profundo de su memoria.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard adjusts his grip on his weapon as he surveys the monstrous creature.{/n} "Why do I get the feeling that I have seen, no, not seen but come across this warp spawn before?" {n}The old officer frowns, as if trying to pry a stubborn memory out of the depths of remembrance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard mueve la mano para empuñar su arma con más comodidad mientras examina a la monstruosa criatura.{/n} «¿Por qué tengo la sensación de que ya he visto... no, verlo no, pero sí que me he topado antes con este engendro de la disformidad?». {n}El viejo oficial frunce el ceño, como si intentase arrancar un recuerdo reticente de lo más profundo de su memoria.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tout en étudiant la créature monstrueuse, Abélard ajuste sa prise pour tenir son arme de façon plus confortable.{/n} « Pourquoi ai-je l'impression d'avoir déjà vu... non, pas vu... croisé cette abomination du Warp par le passé ? » {n}Le vieil officier fronce les sourcils, comme s'il essayait de retrouver un souvenir au plus profond de sa mémoire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard adjusts his grip on his weapon as he surveys the monstrous creature.{/n} "Why do I get the feeling that I have seen, no, not seen but come across this warp spawn before?" {n}The old officer frowns, as if trying to pry a stubborn memory out of the depths of remembrance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tout en étudiant cette créature monstrueuse, Abélard ajuste sa prise en main pour tenir son arme de façon plus confortable.{/n} « Pourquoi ai-je l'impression d'avoir déjà vu... non, pas vu... rencontré cette abomination du Warp par le passé ? » {n}Le vieil officier fronce les sourcils, comme s'il essayait de retrouver un souvenir au plus profond de sa mémoire.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは怪物を観察しながら、武器のグリップを調整する。{/n}「この〈歪み〉の卵には、見覚えがあるような…いや、見たのではなく、出くわしたことがあるような気がするのはなぜでしょう？」{n}老将校は、記憶の奥底から頑固な記憶をこじ開けようとするかのように、顔をしかめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard adjusts his grip on his weapon as he surveys the monstrous creature.{/n} "Why do I get the feeling that I have seen, no, not seen but come across this warp spawn before?" {n}The old officer frowns, as if trying to pry a stubborn memory out of the depths of remembrance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは怪物を観察しながら、武器のグリップを調整する。{/n}「この〈歪み〉の卵には、見覚えがあるような…いや、見たのではなく、出くわしたことがあるような気がするのはなぜでしょう？」{n}老将校は、記憶の奥底から頑固な記憶をこじ開けようとするかのように、顔をしかめる。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, garabet yaratığı incelerken silahını daha da sıkıca kavrıyor.{/n} "Neden bu öteboyut dölünü daha önce görmüşüm gibi... Görmekten de ziyade karşılaşmışım gibi hissediyorum?" {n}Kıdemli subay, hatırasının derinliklerinden inatçı bir anıyı çekip çıkarmaya çalışıyormuşçasına kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard adjusts his grip on his weapon as he surveys the monstrous creature.{/n} "Why do I get the feeling that I have seen, no, not seen but come across this warp spawn before?" {n}The old officer frowns, as if trying to pry a stubborn memory out of the depths of remembrance.{/n}
